name: The Celebrity Personal Assistant Network
tag_list: employment-agency, domestic-staffing, headhunter, recruiter, personal-assistant, celebrity-assistant, executive-assistant
overview: The Celebrity Personal Assistant Network specializes in providing celebrities, executives, and high net worth families with world-class Personal Assistants and Estate Managers in the United States and abroad. We are truly a boutique employment agency that is owned and operated by veteran celebrity PA Brian Daniel. Confidentiality, personal service, and outstanding results are the key factors to our success for placements in both domestic and corporate environments.
